quiz.title: AI Around Us – Quiz Questions
quiz.institution: Department of Information Technology, Sona College of Technology

questions.question: Which of the following best distinguishes Artificial Intelligence from conventional programming?

options.A: AI requires more computational resources than conventional programming
options.B: AI systems can learn and adapt from experience without being explicitly programmed for every scenario
options.C: AI uses more advanced programming languages
options.D: AI systems always perform better than rule-based systems

questions.question: Which AI paradigm enables systems like Siri and Alexa to understand context across multiple interactions?

options.A: Stateless rule-based systems
options.B: Reinforcement learning with contextual bandits
options.C: Natural Language Processing with contextual memory

questions.question: What is the relationship between Deep Learning, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence?

options.A: Deep Learning ⊂ Machine Learning ⊂ Artificial Intelligence
options.B: Machine Learning ⊂ Deep Learning ⊂ Artificial Intelligence
options.C: They are independent fields with no hierarchical relationship
options.D: Artificial Intelligence ⊂ Machine Learning ⊂ Deep Learning

questions.question: Which Python library is specifically designed for building and training deep neural networks with GPU acceleration?

options.A: NumPy and SciPy for mathematical operations
options.B: Pandas for data manipulation
options.C: PyTorch or TensorFlow for deep learning frameworks

questions.question: Which of the following applications requires the LEAST amount of AI sophistication?

options.A: Real-time facial emotion recognition
options.B: Context-aware conversational chatbots
options.C: Rule-based email spam filtering using keyword matching

questions.question: What fundamental limitation distinguishes Narrow AI from Artificial General Intelligence (AGI)?

options.A: Narrow AI has less computational power
options.B: Narrow AI can only excel at specific tasks it was trained for and cannot transfer knowledge across domains
options.C: Narrow AI is less accurate than AGI
options.D: Narrow AI doesn't use neural networks

questions.question: Which learning paradigm allows machines to discover patterns in unlabeled data without human supervision?

options.A: Supervised Learning with labeled datasets
options.B: Reinforcement Learning with reward signals
options.C: Unsupervised Learning through clustering and pattern detection

questions.question: Google Maps' route optimization combines multiple AI techniques. Which is the PRIMARY challenge it addresses?

options.A: Real-time traffic prediction using historical and live data
options.B: Image recognition for street signs
options.C: Voice recognition for navigation commands

questions.question: Netflix's recommendation system primarily uses which ML technique to personalize content suggestions?

options.A: Random content selection algorithms
options.B: Collaborative filtering and deep learning on user behavior patterns
options.C: Simple popularity-based ranking

questions.question: Why do modern AI systems require massive datasets for training?

options.A: To justify the cost of expensive hardware
options.B: Neural networks need extensive examples to learn complex patterns and generalize to unseen data
options.C: Data storage companies need more revenue
options.D: Larger datasets always guarantee better performance

questions.question: Beyond basic image analysis, how are advanced AI systems transforming medical diagnostics?

options.A: Simple digital record keeping and appointment scheduling
options.B: Deep learning models detect subtle patterns in medical imaging, predict disease progression, and assist in personalized treatment planning
options.C: Automating billing and insurance claims processing
options.D: Managing hospital inventory and supply chains

questions.question: What is the most significant advantage of AI-powered adaptive learning systems in education?

options.A: Reducing the need for human teachers
options.B: Personalizing learning pace, content difficulty, and teaching style based on individual student performance and learning patterns
options.C: Eliminating the need for physical classrooms

questions.question: Which AI technique is crucial for smart cities to optimize energy consumption in real-time?

options.A: Manual monitoring and scheduled adjustments
options.B: Predictive analytics and reinforcement learning to forecast demand and automatically adjust resource allocation
options.C: Static scheduling based on historical averages

questions.question: What is the primary AI challenge in autonomous vehicle perception systems?

options.A: Playing entertainment media for passengers
options.B: Real-time sensor fusion from cameras, lidar, and radar to create accurate 3D environmental models under diverse weather conditions
options.C: Managing fuel efficiency calculations
options.D: Providing GPS navigation like regular cars

questions.question: How do modern smartphone AI processors (Neural Processing Units) differ from traditional CPUs?

options.A: They are specialized chips optimized for parallel matrix operations required by neural networks, enabling on-device AI inference
options.B: They only handle basic computational tasks
options.C: They are identical to CPUs with different marketing names

questions.question: Which voice assistant uses Amazon's proprietary wake word detection and natural language understanding?

options.A: Google Assistant with Gemini integration
options.B: Amazon Alexa with AWS infrastructure
options.C: Apple Siri with on-device processing

questions.question: What distinguishes Deep Learning from traditional Machine Learning?

options.A: Deep Learning uses more data storage
options.B: Deep Learning employs multi-layered neural networks that automatically extract hierarchical features from raw data
options.C: Deep Learning is older technology
options.D: Deep Learning only works on images

questions.question: Which transformer architecture does ChatGPT primarily use for language generation?

options.A: BERT (Bidirectional Encoder Representations)
options.B: CNN (Convolutional Neural Network)
options.C: GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer)

questions.question: Which ML technique do banks primarily use for detecting fraudulent transactions in real-time?

options.A: Manual rule-based transaction limits
options.B: Anomaly detection and supervised classification models analyzing transaction patterns
options.C: Random transaction blocking

questions.question: What is the key difference between Artificial Intelligence and Cognitive Computing?

options.A: There is no difference, they are synonyms
options.B: Cognitive Computing focuses on augmenting human decision-making by simulating human thought processes rather than replacing them
options.C: Cognitive Computing is faster than AI
options.D: Cognitive Computing doesn't use neural networks

questions.question: Which technique underlies AI image generation models like DALL·E and Stable Diffusion?

options.A: Simple template matching and filtering
options.B: Diffusion models or GANs (Generative Adversarial Networks) trained on text-image pairs
options.C: Random pixel generation

questions.question: What makes supervised learning effective for spam detection compared to simple keyword filtering?

options.A: It uses longer word lists
options.B: It learns complex patterns and semantic relationships from labeled examples, adapting to evolving spam tactics
options.C: It blocks all emails by default
options.D: It only checks the sender's email address

questions.question: How does Computer Vision differ from simple image processing in robotics?

options.A: Computer Vision only adjusts image brightness
options.B: Computer Vision extracts semantic meaning and understanding from images, enabling scene interpretation and object recognition
options.C: Computer Vision is slower than image processing
options.D: Computer Vision only works with black and white images

questions.question: What AI capability makes Google Maps superior to traditional GPS navigation?

options.A: Larger map database storage
options.B: Machine learning for real-time traffic prediction, ETA calculation, and dynamic route optimization
options.C: Better satellite signal reception

questions.question: Why is high-quality labeled data more critical than just large volumes of data for supervised learning?

options.A: Labeled data requires less storage space
options.B: Models learn from the quality and accuracy of labels; poor labels lead to poor predictions regardless of data volume
options.C: Labeled data processes faster
options.D: Labeled data is cheaper to obtain
